# Input Files:

```{r import}
print(params$Count.file)
print(params$QC.file)
print(params$FEdata)
```


# Load data

```{r load, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
load(params$FEdata)
```

## Experimental design

The experimental design that was set up has `r FE@colDataStruc["n_dFac"]` factors.

```{r design}
lapply(FE@design@List.Factors,summary)
```


## Count matrix

```{r count}
head(assay(FE))
```


# QC

## Design QC

```{r QCdesign, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
mvQCdesign(FE, data="norm", axis=5)
```

## data QC 

```{r QCdata}
mvQCdata(FE,axis=5)
```

# Normalization (TMM)

## Boxplot

```{r boxplot}
boxplotQCnorm(FE)
```

## PCA
```{r PCA}
plotPCAnorm(FE, data="norm", PCs=c(1, 2), condition="groups") 
```
